thread.title: First look: Rochester College's new basketball arena
thread.title_full: First look: Rochester College's new basketball arena

title: First look: Rochester College's new basketball arena
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email First look: Rochester College's new basketball arena A look inside Garth Pleasant Arena on Wednesday, Feb. 15, 2017, at Rochester College in Rochester, Mich. It's the college's first sports arena and opens Saturday when the men's basketball team (26-1) plays Great Lakes Christian College (1-22). It's a 900-seat, $5.3-million arena that covers 23,000 square feet and is named after former men's hoops coach Garth Pleasant, who has 720 career collegiate wins, the most in Michigan.
